file_content.text: All non-essential fleet vessels--withdraw! The Republic ship is preparing to self-destruct!
This is Moff Phennir. We're reading a spike in power levels; you need to get to the bridge!
This is Captain Yelto to Master Do'nair. We've identified the enemy vanguard--intercept immediately!
Reinforcements to decks three, seven and twelve. We need more time to escape that tractor beam!
We've lost engineering, but their vanguard is headed for the bridge. Regroup and protect the command deck!
Seal the doors, power to interior defenses! Let's see if those blueprints were any good.
This is Captain Yelto. All crew members proceed to your assigned security stations. We have been boarded.
We've scanned the cruiser for life signs. There's a full battalion aboard, along with a team of Jedi Knights. Be cautious.
